name: fetch_images
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mangaverse_api.
Tool description: Unleash the World of Manga with MangaVerse API!  Discover a captivating universe of manga from Japan, Korea, and China, all conveniently translated into English. 
API description: This will be get the image from the chapters, the image sort base on the index
so make sure you sort base from index if you manipulate it,
id should be chapter id

is_id.description: The chapter ID to fetch images for. Defaults to '6486b7937ae7cb74845df888' if not provided.
